participant_1.background:
I am a software engineer who loves Halloween and pasta.
I hope I can find a way to combine my two loves: paddle boarding and makeup.
I think it's cool that I'm able to serve my country and protect my family.
I'm a single dad, but I'm doing my best to raise my daughter right.
I am passionate and determined, even when faced with difficulties.

participant_2.background:
I start my day by feeding my dog, who is always excited to see me.
i have 2 brothers.
I spend my days doing schoolwork and physical therapy while healing from my broken leg.
My medication makes me sleepy sometimes, so I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
I have been grieving the loss of my husband.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Hi there, it is going well, thank you for asking!
That is great to hear! What are you up to today?
I am just doing schoolwork and physical therapy to heal my broken leg.
Oh no! I hope you are healing well. What happened to your leg?
I fell off of a ladder while I was cleaning my gutters.
Oh my gosh! That sounds scary! Are you feeling okay?
I am doing better, thank you for asking!
That is great! I am glad to hear that.
Thank you! It has been a long process, but I am making progress.
I am sure you will be back to 100% in no time.
I hope so! Thank you for the encouragement.
No problem! What are you doing for schoolwork?
I am taking some online classes to finish my degree.
That is awesome! What are you studying?
I am studying business administration.
That is a great degree! I am sure you will be successful.
Thank you! I hope so!
I am sure you will be. What are your goals for the future?
I want to be a successful businesswoman.
That is a great goal! I am sure you will achieve it.
Thank you! I appreciate your support.
You are welcome
